nodes.text: The W4-KL Astromech Droid was a type of astromech droid available during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The W4-K2 Astromech Droid is a pet that was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Update 2.10 on September 9, 2014. It is purchasable through the in-game Cartel Market.
